member.summary: Gets or sets a sound played when the Vista-like task dialog is shown.

member.summary: Gets or sets an implementation of IWin32Window that will own the modal task dialog.

member.summary: Gets or sets the text to display in the Vista-like task dialog.

member.summary: The collection of links contained within the Content LinkLabel.

member.name: P:LukeSw.Windows.Forms.VDialog.WindowTitle
member.summary: Gets or sets the text to display in the title bar of the Vista-like task dialog.

member.name: P:LukeSw.Windows.Forms.VDialog.MainInstruction
member.summary: Gets or sets the text to be used for the main instruction of the Vista-like task dialog.

member.name: P:LukeSw.Windows.Forms.VDialog.Buttons
member.summary: Gets or sets the array of the VDialogButtons that specifies which buttons to display in the Vista-like task dialog.

member.name: P:LukeSw.Windows.Forms.VDialog.MainIcon
member.summary: Gets or sets the one of the VDialogIcon values that specifies which icon on what background to display in the Vista-like task dialog.

member.name: P:LukeSw.Windows.Forms.VDialog.CustomMainIcon
member.summary: Gets or sets the custom image to display in the Vista-like task dialog.

member.name: P:LukeSw.Windows.Forms.VDialog.FooterIcon
member.summary: Gets or sets the one of the VDialogIcon values that specifies which icon to display in the footer of the Vista-like task dialog.

member.name: P:LukeSw.Windows.Forms.VDialog.CustomFooterIcon
member.summary: Gets or sets the custom image to display in the footer of the Vista-like task dialog.

member.name: P:LukeSw.Windows.Forms.VDialog.FooterText
member.summary: Gets or sets the text to display in the footer of the Vista-like task dialog.

member.name: P:LukeSw.Windows.Forms.VDialog.FooterLinks
member.summary: The collection of links contained within the Footer LinkLabel.

member.name: P:LukeSw.Windows.Forms.VDialog.DefaultButton
member.summary: Gets or sets one of the VDialogDefaultButton values that specifies the default button for the Vista-like task dialog.

member.name: P:LukeSw.Windows.Forms.VDialog.RightToLeft
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the text appears from right to left, such as when using Hebrew or Arabic fonts.

member.name: P:LukeSw.Windows.Forms.VDialog.RightToLeftLayout
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether right-to-left mirror placement is turned on.

member.name: P:LukeSw.Windows.Forms.VDialog.Result
member.summary: Gets or sets the dialog result for the VDialog form.

member.name: P:LukeSw.Windows.Forms.VDialog.LockSystem
member.summary: Determines whether to lock system while showing the Vista-like task dialog.

member.name: P:LukeSw.Windows.Forms.VDialog.CustomControl
member.summary: Gets or sets the custom control to display in the Vista-like task dialog.

member.name: P:LukeSw.Windows.Forms.VDialog.VerificationFlagChecked
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the verification checkbox in the dialog should be checked when the dialog is initially displayed.

member.name: P:LukeSw.Windows.Forms.VDialog.VerificationText
member.summary: Gets or sets the string to be used to label the verification checkbox. If this parameter is Nothing (null), the verification checkbox is not displayed in the Vista-like task dialog.

member.name: P:LukeSw.Windows.Forms.VDialog.ExpandFooterArea
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the the string specified by the ExpandedInformation property should be displayed at the bottom of the Vista-like task dialog's footer area instead of immediately after the Vista-like task dialog's content.

member.name: P:LukeSw.Windows.Forms.VDialog.ExpandedByDefault
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the string specified by the ExpandedInformation property should be displayed when the Vista-like task dialog is initially displayed.

member.name: P:LukeSw.Windows.Forms.VDialog.ExpandedInformation
member.summary: Gets or sets the string to be used for displaying additional information. The additional information is displayed either immediately below the content or below the footer text depending on whether the ExpandFooterArea property is set.

member.name: P:LukeSw.Windows.Forms.VDialog.ExpandedInformationLinks
member.summary: The collection of links contained within the Footer LinkLabel.

member.name: P:LukeSw.Windows.Forms.VDialog.ExpandedControlText
member.summary: Gets or sets the string to be used to label the button for collapsing the expandable information.

member.name: P:LukeSw.Windows.Forms.VDialog.CollapsedControlText
member.summary: Gets or sets the string to be used to label the button for expanding the expandable information.

member.name: T:LukeSw.Windows.Forms.VDialog
member.summary: Displays a Vista-like message box or task dialog that can contain text, buttons, symbols and other elements that inform and instruct the user.

member.summary: Plays the system sound.

member.summary: Gets the sound associated with the Default program event in the current Windows sound scheme.

member.name: P:LukeSw.Windows.Forms.VDialogSound.Information
member.summary: Gets the sound associated with the Asterisk program event in the current Windows sound scheme.

member.name: P:LukeSw.Windows.Forms.VDialogSound.Question
member.summary: Gets the sound associated with the Question program event in the current Windows sound scheme.

member.name: P:LukeSw.Windows.Forms.VDialogSound.Warning
member.summary: Gets the sound associated with the Exclamation program event in the current Windows sound scheme.

member.name: P:LukeSw.Windows.Forms.VDialogSound.Error
member.summary: Gets the sound associated with the Hand program event in the current Windows sound scheme.

member.name: P:LukeSw.Windows.Forms.VDialogSound.Security
member.summary: Gets the sound associated with the WindowsUAC program event in the current Windows sound scheme.
member.remarks: On pre-Vista systems it gets the sound associated with the Hand program event in the current Windows sound scheme.

member.name: T:LukeSw.Windows.Forms.VDialogSound
member.summary: Represents a system sound.

member.name: F:LukeSw.Windows.Forms.VDialogIcon.None
member.summary: The VDialog contains no icon. The background is white.

member.name: F:LukeSw.Windows.Forms.VDialogIcon.Information
member.summary: The VDialog contains a symbol consisting of a lowercase letter i in a circle. The background is white.

member.name: F:LukeSw.Windows.Forms.VDialogIcon.Question
member.summary: The VDialog contains a symbol consisting of a question mark in a circle. The background is white.

member.name: F:LukeSw.Windows.Forms.VDialogIcon.Warning
member.summary: The VDialog contains a symbol consisting of an exclamation point in a yellow triangle. The background is white.

member.name: F:LukeSw.Windows.Forms.VDialogIcon.Error
member.summary: The VDialog contains a symbol consisting of white X in a red circle. The background is white.

member.name: F:LukeSw.Windows.Forms.VDialogIcon.SecuritySuccess
member.summary: The VDialog contains a symbol consisting of white check mark in a green shield. The background is green.

member.name: F:LukeSw.Windows.Forms.VDialogIcon.SecurityQuestion
member.summary: The VDialog contains a symbol consisting of a question mark in a blue shield. The background is blue.

member.name: F:LukeSw.Windows.Forms.VDialogIcon.SecurityWarning
member.summary: The VDialog contains a symbol consisting of an exclamation point in a yellow shield. The background is yellow.

member.name: F:LukeSw.Windows.Forms.VDialogIcon.SecurityError
member.summary: The VDialog contains a symbol consisting of white X in a red shield. The background is red.

member.name: F:LukeSw.Windows.Forms.VDialogIcon.SecurityShield
member.summary: The VDialog contains a symbol of a multicolored shield. The background is white.

member.name: F:LukeSw.Windows.Forms.VDialogIcon.SecurityShieldBlue
member.summary: The VDialog contains a symbol of a multicolored shield. The background is blue-to-green gradient.

member.name: F:LukeSw.Windows.Forms.VDialogIcon.SecurityShieldGray
member.summary: The VDialog contains a symbol of a multicolored shield. The background is gray.

member.summary: Specifies constants defining which icon to display on what background.
